Centrifuges

Explore our extensive centrifuge selection, featuring Microfuge, high-performance benchtop, floor-model ultracentrifuges, and analytical ultracentrifugation instruments. Plus, find the perfect rotors and supplies for your specific sample needs, ensuring precise results and performance in laboratories worldwide.

For over seven decades, we've been the go-to destination for laboratory centrifugation solutions, serving a global clientele across diverse sectors including life sciences, biotech, pharma, clinical diagnostics, academia, and industry. Our unwavering commitment to excellence has solidified our reputation as a trusted provider of cutting-edge centrifuge technology and associated accessories. Our extensive product portfolio encompasses a wide range of centrifuge types, from the compact Microfuge models to high-performance benchtop and floor-model ultracentrifuges, as well as analytical ultracentrifugation instruments. We understand that each application has unique requirements, which is why we offer a comprehensive selection of rotors and supplies tailored to specific needs, accommodating various sample volumes, g-forces, and RPMs. Moreover, our dedication to supporting research endeavors extends to durable supplies like tubes, bottles, and liners. These accessories are designed to complement our centrifuges, ensuring seamless and efficient sample processing. Join the ranks of laboratories, hospitals, and universities worldwide that have entrusted us with their centrifugation needs. Experience the difference our expertise can make in your scientific pursuits, with reliable, precise, and high-performance centrifuge solutions.
